text: allaah hee hai, jisane sarvottam haî€¼dees (quraan) ko avatarit kiya hai. aisee pustak, jisakee aayaten milatee-julatee baar-baar duharaee jaane vaalee hain. jise (sunakar) khade ho jaate hain unake roongate, jo darate hain apane paalanahaar se. phir komal ho jaate hain unake ang tatha dil, allaah ke smaran kee or. yahee hai allaah ka maargadarshan, jisake dvaara vah sammaarg par laga deta hai, jise chaahata hai aur jise allaah kupath kar de, to usaka koee pathadarshak nahin hai
